Disease.Name: MUCOPOLYSACCHARIDOSIS IV; MORQUIO A SYNDROME
Disease.Gene:
16q24.3Detail information to gene locus by the National Center for Biotechnology Information NCBI:
Galactosamine (N-acetyl)-6-sulfate sulfatase
Disease.Summary: rare (1:300000);autosomal recessive ;MUCOPOLYSACCHARIDOSIS IV:;Type A: severe form ;Type B: milder form

symtomp.symptom: chest deformity / pectus carinatum/excavatum, starnal bulging

symtomp.category: GENERAL TOPICS | IMMUNE OR HEMATOLOGIC SYSTEM
